debates.showAs: Occupying Power (Securities and Handling of Settlement Goods) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that the Central Bank shall not approve a prospectus for securities issued by or on behalf of a state that is an occupying power; to provide for the purposes of the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015 that a dismissal of an employee shall be deemed unfair where it arises from a refusal to handle goods associated with the activities of an occupying power within occupied territory; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú nach gceadóidh an Banc Ceannais réamheolaire le haghaidh urrúis arna n-eisiúint ag stát is cumhacht forghabhála, nó thar ceann stát den sórt sin; do dhéanamh socrú, chun críocha na nAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015, go measfar dífhostú fostaí a bheith éagórach i gcás go n-eascraíonn sé as diúltú earraí atá bainteach le gníomhaíochtaí cumhachta forghabhála laistigh de chríoch faoi fhorghabháil a láimhseáil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Occupying Power (Securities and Handling of Settlement Goods) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chumhacht Forghabhála (Urrúis agus Láimhseáil Earraí Lonnaíochta), 2025

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Leave for Health Screening Purposes) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a period of paid leave in order to enable employees to participate in health screening programmes; for that purpose to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997; to extend the protection against unfair dismissals conferred by the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015; to provide for the consequential amendment of certain other Acts; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhse saoire le pá d’fhonn a chumasú d’fhostaithe páirt a ghlacadh i gcláir braitheoireachta sláinte; chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997; do leathnú na cosanta ar dhífhostú éagórach a thugtar leis na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasú iarmhartach a dhéanamh ar Achtanna áirithe eile; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Leave for Health Screening Purposes) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Saoire chun críoch Braitheoireachta Sláinte), 2025

debates.showAs: Aircraft Noise (Dublin Airport) Regulation (Transfer of Functions) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Aircraft Noise (Dublin Airport) Regulation (Transfer of Functions) Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Aircraft Noise (Dublin Airport) Regulation (Transfer of Functions) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to give further effect to the Aircraft Noise Regulation in so far as it relates to Dublin Airport by transferring the functions of the competent authority for the purposes of that Regulation from the Fingal County Council to the Environmental Protection Agency; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta don Rialachán um Thorann Aerárthaí a mhéid a bhaineann sé le hAerfort Bhaile Átha Cliath trí fheidhmeanna an údaráis inniúil chun críocha an Rialacháin sin a aistriú ó Chomhairle Contae Fhine Gall chuig an nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Aircraft Noise (Dublin Airport) Regulation (Transfer of Functions) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thorann Aerárthaí (Aerfort Bhaile Átha Cliath) a Rialáil (Feidhmeanna a Aistriú), 2024

debates.showAs: Protection of Accident Victims from Non-Consensual Recording of Images Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Protection of Accident Victims from Non-Consensual Recording of Images Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the recording or publication without consent of certain images of persons who are dead, seriously injured or in shock as a result of an accident or other emergency, and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc íomhánna áirithe de dhaoine atá marbh, a ndearnadh mórdhíobháil dóibh, nó atá suaite de thoradh tionóisce nó éigeandáil eile, a thaifeadadh nó a fhoilsiú gan toiliú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Accident Victims from Non-Consensual Recording of Images Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Íospartaigh Tionóiscí a Chosaint ar Thaifeadadh Neamh-Chomhthoiliúil Íomhánna, 2022

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an autism strategy to be prepared and published, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le straitéis uathachais a ullmhú agus a fhoilsiú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Education (Admission to Schools) (Co-Education) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to disapply at separate future dates, in relation to recognised primary and post-primary schools, the exemption provided by certain enactments from the prohibition against discrimination on the gender ground in educational establishments, and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an díolúine a fhoráiltear le hachtacháin áirithe, is díolúine ón toirmeasc ar idirdhealú ar an bhforas inscne i mbunachais oideachais, a dhífheidhmiú ar dhátaí ar leithligh sa todhchaí i ndáil le bunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna aitheanta, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Ligean Isteach i Scoileanna) (Comhoideachas), 2022

debates.showAs: National Standards Authority of Ireland (Carbon Footprint Labelling) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
National Standards Authority of Ireland (Carbon Footprint Labelling) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
National Standards Authority of Ireland (Carbon Footprint Labelling) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to confer functions on the National Standards Authority of Ireland in relation to promoting the use of standard specifications and standard marks to give information about the carbon footprint of commodities, process and practices.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt feidhmeanna don Údarás um Chaighdeáin Náisiúnta na hÉireann i ndáil le húsáid sonraíochtaí caighdeánacha agus marcanna caighdeánacha a chur chun cinn chun faisnéis a thabhairt i dtaobh lorg carbóin tráchtearraí, próiseas agus cleachtas.
bill.shortTitleEn: National Standards Authority of Ireland (Carbon Footprint Labelling) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fán Údarás um Chaighdeáin Náisiúnta na hÉireann (Lipéadú Loirg Carbóin), 2021

debates.showAs: Consumer Protection (Loyalty Penalty and Customer Complaints) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit differential pricing in respect of certain subscription service supplied to consumers; to require certain traders to establish schemes for handling consumer complaints in relation to their services and to prescribe minimum standards in relation to such schemes; for those purposes to amend the Consumer Protection Act 2007; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc praghsáil dhifreálach i leith seirbhísí síntiúis áirithe a sholáthraítear do thomhaltóirí; dá cheangal ar thrádálaithe áirithe scéimeanna a bhunú chun gearáin ó chustaiméirí i ndáil lena gcuid seirbhísí a láimhseáil agus chun caighdeáin íosta a fhorordú i ndáil le scéimeanna den sórt sin; chun na gcríoch sin, do leasú an Achta um Chosaint Tomhaltóirí, 2007; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Consumer Protection (Loyalty Penalty and Customer Complaints) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Tomhaltóirí (Pionós Dílseachta agus Gearáin ó Chustaiméirí), 2021

debates.showAs: Working from Home (Covid-19) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Working from Home (Covid-19) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide employees working remotely with a right to switch off from out of working hours work-related electronic communications, to disapply subject to conditions certain provisions of the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 in the case of certain employees working temporarily from home, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt ceart d’fhostaithe atá ag obair go cianda dícheangal ó chumarsáid leictreonach a bhaineann leis an obair lasmuigh d’uaireanta oibre, do dhífheidhmiú forálacha áirithe den Acht um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005, faoi réir coinníollacha, i gcás fostaithe áirithe atá ag obair sa bhaile go sealadach, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Obair sa Bhaile (Covid-19), 2020

debates.showAs: Industrial Relations (Sectoral Employment Orders Confirmation) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to give statutory effect to recommendations of the Labour Court in relation to pay and conditions in certain sectors of the economy; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt éifeacht reachtúil do mholtaí ón gCúirt Oibreachais i ndáil le pá agus coinníollacha in earnálacha áirithe den gheilleagar; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Industrial Relations (Sectoral Employment Orders Confirmation) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Caidrimh Thionscail (Orduithe Fostaíochta Earnála a Dhaingniú), 2020
